FuncDef: The display nat simple-configuration service-instance-group command displays information about a service-instance-group service instance group and a service-location backup group that are generated by default in a simplified NAT instance.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the nat instance simple-configuration command is run to create a simplified NAT instance, a device automatically generates a service-instance-group service instance group named _default_ and binds the NAT instance to the instance group. Then the location slot command is run in the NAT instance so that the device automatically generates a service-location backup group and binds it to the instance group named _default_.
To view information about a service-instance-group service instance group and a service-location backup group that are generated by default in a simplified NAT instance, run the display nat simple-configuration service-instance-group.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
